reviews.review:
Honestly this game is a masterpiece. You have screaming people on all sides, vulgar language, sexual harassment (of both genders), threats, people that appear to be cheating, people that actually are cheating, non mainstream jokes, racism, and so much negativity that it's truly wonderful, because it's a break from rules. IF you wish to cheat there are community servers specifically for it, but I recommend not cheating at all, because then when somebody accuses you of cheating, it's because they suck compared to you, and not that you're cheating in a competitive match or casual or arms race, ruining people's day.

Overall I give this game a good 7.8/10, the economy is a powerful feature that can ruin you or can give you enough cash to buy a full Index setup.

Para comenzar me gustaria decir que es un buen juego hablando generalmente, al comienzo es dificil, de verdad complicado ya que maneja una forma de juego que ningun shooter posee, las mecanicas de las armas llevan tiempo para aprenderlas, los mapas y demas cosas que son necesarias para tener un nivel dentro del juego.

Es un juego muy bueno, pero exige echarle horas para poder disfrutarlo.
die valve pls. just die with you game
Такое же мертвое говно, как и твоя мать

Игра оч крутая в плане лучшей версии кс от компании  Valve. Но вот что могу сказать про обновление:  то что они поменяли фон на новый это глупость старый был лучше и кст обновление происходит не часто. В плане геймплея как и было обычеый так  и остался и не надо было делать кс го халявной это большая ошибка много читеров. Моя оценка 8/12
Más que amortizado, infinitas horas de entretemimiento

This game is amaaing if you are going to play on the prime account. The free version ahs many hackers and cheaters but in the 15$ prime version there is little-non cheaters and very fun to play with your teammates. Meet new people and communication is key.
